entry.value:
[{"idReadable":"P-333","updated":1664272355825,"resolved":null,"summary":"Add possibility to store Bussines Extras amount","reporter":{"login":"Taras_Kondratiuk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

dev:

  • When admin editing Bussines Extras it should be stored in DB
  • The Bussines Extras should has the same created date as Payment in which the Bussines Extras edited
  • When Payment is calculating it should included Bussines Extras amount if exists or default value '0' if not
  • When the admin updates a Busines Extras and the Busines Extras already exits for current payment it should rewrite its value
  • After updating the Business Extras payment should be recalculated
  • Business Extras should has next fields: user_id,created_date_time,amount, comment
  • Edit dialog should be as in Wage fields

DOD

  • â€¦
  • "Update from spreadsheet" button doesn't update businessExtras

{"idReadable":"P-401","updated":1663937859746,"resolved":null,"summary":"Single Wage per month","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

When Admin adds a new wage and another Wage exists for the same user-month pair, then the old value is overwritten.

DOD:

  • only one user-month pair for Wage is allowed

{"idReadable":"P-384","updated":1663935368959,"resolved":null,"summary":"Add ability to select date on Staffer Wage edit","reporter":{"login":"ykoval","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[{"deleted":false,"textPreview":"

Already spent 14 points for the previous sprint

","author":{"login":"Taras_Kondratiuk","name":"Taras Kondratiuk","$type":"User"},"updated":null,"created":1663588675665,"id":"4-251","$type":"IssueComment"}],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  • double-click on the Wage field of Staffer opens Wage Edit Dialog
  • the Dialog has two fields Wage and Date
  • default date picker value is current date
  • default Wage value is existing Staffer Wage
  • Wage can not be negative
  • Wage is an integer
  • the Dialog is not closed if Wage is not saved
  • the latest Wage is displayed after the Dialog is closed
  • Notification with saved value is displayed on Dialog close
  • Notification is localized
  • After successful save of wage, Wage for updated userId is fetched
